wp_job_board_settings.admin_notice_add_new_listing_content:
Hello

New Job "{{job_title}}" is Posted by {{author}} this employer you can review this job as a admin after reviewing you can approved or disapproved as you want .please follow below for all information submitted by user while posting new job.
wp_job_board_settings.admin_notice_updated_listing_content:
Hello

Updated Job "{{job_title}}" is Posted by {{author}} this employer you can review this job as a admin after reviewing you can approved or disapproved as you want .please follow below for all information submitted by user while posting new job.
wp_job_board_settings.admin_notice_expiring_listing_content:
The following job listing is expiring soon from {{website_name}} ({{website_url}})

Visit WordPress admin ({{job_admin_edit_url}}) to manage the listing.
wp_job_board_settings.employer_notice_expiring_listing_content:
Hello

you posted Job "{{job_title}}" is expiring soon. you can renew this jobs by login to your Employer account go to Manage Jobs ({{dashboard_url}}) > find your jobs from listings "{{job_title}}" Edit your job select package on step 2 and update your job by this ways your jobs will be publish again.
